para: Format for cotoGPS, a Palm GPS program. It can read both track and marker (waypoint) files. It is currently unable to write track files, so only marker files can be written. The marker categories are written to and read from the icon description. The 'Not Assigned' category leaves the icon description empty on read. Currently geocache info is ignored.
zerocat (output) - Name for the Palm 'Not Assigned' category. Defaults to 'Not Assigned'.

There is also a debugging option called 'internals' which takes a XCSV delimiter value. It writes some internal values (distance, arc, x and y) of the cotoGPS track format to the notes field. URL: core.de/~coto Contributed by Tobias Minich.
